<ol>
<li>Em <a href="{{ site.baseurl }}{% link _posts/2020-07-07-metadados-normativos-federais.md %}">metadados de normas jur√≠dicas federais</a> coletamos dados do sistema LexML.</li>
<li>Em <a href="{{ site.baseurl }}{% link _posts/2020-07-12-gov-data-product.md%}">um produto orientado a dados governamentais: parte 1</a> realizamos uma an√°lise explorat√≥ria dos dados e definimos um recorte e um escopo para os dados do projeto.</li>
<li>Em <a href="{{ site.baseurl }}{% link _posts/2020-07-20-gov-data-product-p2.md%}">um produto orientado a dados governamentais: parte 2</a> realizamos a defini√ß√£o dos dos datasets de treino, valida√ß√£o e teste</li>
<li>Em <a href="{{ site.baseurl }}{% link _posts/2020-07-26-gov-data-product-p3.md%}">um produto orientado a dados governamentais: parte 3</a> detalhamos tudo que n√£o deu certo no treinamento de modelos de machine learning.</li>
<li>Em <a href="{{ site.baseurl }}{% link _posts/2020-07-30-gov-data-product-p4.md%}">um produto orientado a dados governamentais: parte 4</a> apresentamos o treinamento de um modelo de deep learning</li>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>O √∫ltimo passo de toda prova de conceito √© fazer uma apresenta√ß√£o das funcionalidades do projeto para os <em>stakeholders</em> üï¥Ô∏è. Por mais que tenhamos uma api funcional, ela √© o <em>backend</em> da nossa solu√ß√£o. Portanto, temos que criar uma interface de usu√°rio para o nosso produto, isto √©, o <em>frontend</em> da aplica√ß√£o üíª. Depois de alguma pesquisa, decidimos construi-lo com o <a href="https://www.streamlit.io/"><em>streamlit</em></a>. √â um framework novo, que sequer chegou a sua vers√£o 1.0, todavia, apresenta uma capacidade incr√≠vel de produzir aplicativos webs com poucas linhas de c√≥digo e ainda em python que √© a linguagem que utilizamos em todo o projeto.</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>Antes de iniciar a constru√ß√£o do <em>frontend</em>, vamos definir uma fun√ß√£o que ser√° utilizada pelo backend para realizar a consulta a <code>api</code>.</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
    {% raw %}
    
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">

<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">typing</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">Optional</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">List</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">requests</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">json</span>
<span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">parse_ementa</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">ementa</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nb">str</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">-&gt;</span> <span class="n">Optional</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">List</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="nb">str</span><span class="p">]]:</span>
    <span class="sd">&quot;&quot;&quot;</span>
<span class="sd">    Realiza a consulta a api a partir do texto de uma ementa. </span>
<span class="sd">    &quot;&quot;&quot;</span>
    <span class="n">url</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">&#39;https://pylegalclassifier.azurewebsites.net/predict&#39;</span>
    <span class="n">payload</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span><span class="s2">&quot;ementa&quot;</span> <span class="p">:</span> <span class="n">ementa</span><span class="p">}</span>
    <span class="n">r</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">requests</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">post</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">url</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">json</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">payload</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">r</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">status_code</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="mi">200</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">response</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">json</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loads</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">r</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">text</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">get</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;tags&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">response</span>
    <span class="k">else</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="k">return</span> <span class="kc">None</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
    {% endraw %}

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>O <em>streamlit</em> como ainda n√£o n√£o publicou sua vers√£o de api est√°vel (1.0) nos indica que √© um produto em matura√ß√£o e evolu√ß√£o r√°pida. Portanto, algumas funcionalidades ainda est√£o ausentes ou mesmo em constru√ß√£o. Uma dessas envid√™ncias √© a discuss√£o de como o framework <a href="https://discuss.streamlit.io/t/alternative-implementation-of-session-state/799">gerencia estados nos seus componentes</a>. Nos faremos uso de um chunk de c√≥digo disponibilizado nesse <a href="https://gist.github.com/tvst/036da038ab3e999a64497f42de966a92">gist</a> para alterar algumas funcionalidades da biblioteca, s√≥ recomendo o c√≥digo para os mais entusiastas.</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
    {% raw %}
    
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<details class="description">
      <summary class="btn btn-sm" data-open="Hide Code" data-close="Show Code"></summary>
        <p><div class="input">

<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1">#SessionState.py</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">streamlit.ReportThread</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">ReportThread</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">streamlit.server.Server</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">Server</span>

<span class="k">class</span> <span class="nc">SessionState</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">object</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="k">def</span> <span class="fm">__init__</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="bp">self</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="o">**</span><span class="n">kwargs</span><span class="p">):</span>
        <span class="sd">&quot;&quot;&quot;A new SessionState object.</span>
<span class="sd">        Parameters</span>
<span class="sd">        ----------</span>
<span class="sd">        **kwargs : any</span>
<span class="sd">            Default values for the session state.</span>
<span class="sd">        Example</span>
<span class="sd">        -------</span>
<span class="sd">        &gt;&gt;&gt; session_state = SessionState(user_name=&#39;&#39;, favorite_color=&#39;black&#39;)</span>
<span class="sd">        &gt;&gt;&gt; session_state.user_name = &#39;Mary&#39;</span>
<span class="sd">        &#39;&#39;</span>
<span class="sd">        &gt;&gt;&gt; session_state.favorite_color</span>
<span class="sd">        &#39;black&#39;</span>
<span class="sd">        &quot;&quot;&quot;</span>
        <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">key</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">val</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">kwargs</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">items</span><span class="p">():</span>
            <span class="nb">setattr</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="bp">self</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">key</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">val</span><span class="p">)</span>


<span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">get</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="o">**</span><span class="n">kwargs</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="sd">&quot;&quot;&quot;Gets a SessionState object for the current session.</span>
<span class="sd">    Creates a new object if necessary.</span>
<span class="sd">    Parameters</span>
<span class="sd">    ----------</span>
<span class="sd">    **kwargs : any</span>
<span class="sd">        Default values you want to add to the session state, if we&#39;re creating a</span>
<span class="sd">        new one.</span>
<span class="sd">    Example</span>
<span class="sd">    -------</span>
<span class="sd">    &gt;&gt;&gt; session_state = get(user_name=&#39;&#39;, favorite_color=&#39;black&#39;)</span>
<span class="sd">    &gt;&gt;&gt; session_state.user_name</span>
<span class="sd">    &#39;&#39;</span>
<span class="sd">    &gt;&gt;&gt; session_state.user_name = &#39;Mary&#39;</span>
<span class="sd">    &gt;&gt;&gt; session_state.favorite_color</span>
<span class="sd">    &#39;black&#39;</span>
<span class="sd">    Since you set user_name above, next time your script runs this will be the</span>
<span class="sd">    result:</span>
<span class="sd">    &gt;&gt;&gt; session_state = get(user_name=&#39;&#39;, favorite_color=&#39;black&#39;)</span>
<span class="sd">    &gt;&gt;&gt; session_state.user_name</span>
<span class="sd">    &#39;Mary&#39;</span>
<span class="sd">    &quot;&quot;&quot;</span>
    <span class="c1"># Hack to get the session object from Streamlit.</span>

    <span class="n">ctx</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">ReportThread</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">get_report_ctx</span><span class="p">()</span>

    <span class="n">this_session</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">None</span>
    
    <span class="n">current_server</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Server</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">get_current</span><span class="p">()</span>
    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="nb">hasattr</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">current_server</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;_session_infos&#39;</span><span class="p">):</span>
        <span class="c1"># Streamlit &lt; 0.56        </span>
        <span class="n">session_infos</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Server</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">get_current</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">_session_infos</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">values</span><span class="p">()</span>
    <span class="k">else</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">session_infos</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Server</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">get_current</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">_session_info_by_id</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">values</span><span class="p">()</span>

    <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">session_info</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">session_infos</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">s</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">session_info</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">session</span>
        <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span>
            <span class="c1"># Streamlit &lt; 0.54.0</span>
            <span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">hasattr</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">s</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;_main_dg&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="ow">and</span> <span class="n">s</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">_main_dg</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="n">ctx</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">main_dg</span><span class="p">)</span>
            <span class="ow">or</span>
            <span class="c1"># Streamlit &gt;= 0.54.0</span>
            <span class="p">(</span><span class="ow">not</span> <span class="nb">hasattr</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">s</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;_main_dg&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="ow">and</span> <span class="n">s</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">enqueue</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="n">ctx</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">enqueue</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="p">):</span>
            <span class="n">this_session</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">s</span>

    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">this_session</span> <span class="ow">is</span> <span class="kc">None</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="k">raise</span> <span class="ne">RuntimeError</span><span class="p">(</span>
            <span class="s2">&quot;Oh noes. Couldn&#39;t get your Streamlit Session object&quot;</span>
            <span class="s1">&#39;Are you doing something fancy with threads?&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span>

    <span class="c1"># Got the session object! Now let&#39;s attach some state into it.</span>

    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="ow">not</span> <span class="nb">hasattr</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">this_session</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;_custom_session_state&#39;</span><span class="p">):</span>
        <span class="n">this_session</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">_custom_session_state</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">SessionState</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="o">**</span><span class="n">kwargs</span><span class="p">)</span>

    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">this_session</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">_custom_session_state</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>
</p>
    </details>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>O pr√≥ximo passo ser√° a constru√ß√£o da p√°gina para o app (<code>app.py</code>). Al√©m disso, o nosso produto precisa de um nome, que ap√≥s alguns segundos de reflex√£o ü§£ decidimos chamar üß† py-classifica-legal ü§ñ. Abaixo encontra-se, todo o c√≥digo da nossa aplica√ß√£o, incr√≠veis 40 linhas de c√≥digo üò≤!</p>

</div>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">

<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">streamlit</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">st</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">SessionState</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">api.response</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">parse_ementa</span>

<span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">main</span><span class="p">():</span>
    <span class="sd">&quot;&quot;&quot; Classificador de normas infraconstitucionais&quot;&quot;&quot;</span>
    <span class="n">multi_tags</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">&#39;ACORDO INTERNACIONAL&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;ALTERA√á√ÉO&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;AMBITO&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;APROVA√á√ÉO&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span>
            <span class="s1">&#39;AREA PRIORITARIA&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;ATO&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;AUTORIZA√á√ÉO&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;BRASIL&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;COMPETENCIA&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span>
            <span class="s1">&#39;COMPOSI√á√ÉO&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;CONCESS√ÉO&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;CORRELA√á√ÉO&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;CREDITO SUPLEMENTAR&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span>
            <span class="s1">&#39;CRIA√á√ÉO&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;CRITERIOS&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;DECLARA√á√ÉO&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;DESAPROPRIA√á√ÉO&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;DESTINA√á√ÉO&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span>
            <span class="s1">&#39;DISPOSITIVOS&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;DOTA√á√ÉO OR√áAMENTARIA&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;EMPRESA DE TELECOMUNICA√á√ïES&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span>
            <span class="s1">&#39;ESTADO DE MINAS GERAIS MG&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;ESTADO DE S√ÉO PAULO SP&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span>
            <span class="s1">&#39;ESTADO DO PARANA PR&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;ESTADO DO RIO GRANDE DO SUL RS&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;EXECUTIVO&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span>
            <span class="s1">&#39;EXECU√á√ÉO&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;FIXA√á√ÉO&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;FUNCIONAMENTO&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;HIPOTESE&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;IMOVEL RURAL&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span>
            <span class="s1">&#39;INSTITUTO NACIONAL DE COLONIZA√á√ÉO E REFORMA AGRARIA INCRA&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span>
            <span class="s1">&#39;INTERESSE SOCIAL&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;MUNICIPIO&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;NORMAS&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;OBJETIVO&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span>
            <span class="s1">&#39;OR√áAMENTO DA SEGURIDADE SOCIAL&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;OR√áAMENTO FISCAL&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span>
            <span class="s1">&#39;PAIS ESTRANGEIRO&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;RADIODIFUS√ÉO&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;REFORMA AGRARIA&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;REFOR√áO&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span>
            <span class="s1">&#39;RENOVA√á√ÉO&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;SERVI√áO&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;TEXTO&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;UNI√ÉO FEDERAL&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;UTILIDADE PUBLICA&#39;</span><span class="p">]</span>
    <span class="n">st</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">title</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;üß† py-classifica-legal ü§ñ&quot;</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">st</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">subheader</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;Um classificador para normas infraconstitucionais ‚öñÔ∏è.&quot;</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">st</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">markdown</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;O *py-classifica-legal* foi treinado com uma base de mais de 30.000 normas legais. O intuito do programa √© auxiliar em uma melhor governan√ßa de dados p√∫blicos, por meio de sugest√µes de classifica√ß√µes de normas infraconstitucionais a partir de suas respectivas ementas.&quot;</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">st</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">markdown</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;Voc√™ pode consultar alguns exemplos de ementas clicando &lt;a href=&#39;http://www4.planalto.gov.br/legislacao/portal-legis/legislacao-1/decretos1/2020-decretos&#39; target=&#39;_blank&#39; style=&#39;color: #f97b6f;&#39;&gt; aqui.&lt;/a&gt;&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">unsafe_allow_html</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">session_state</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">SessionState</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">get</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">name</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">&quot;&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">button_sent</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">input_ementa</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">st</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">text_area</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;Insira o texto da ementa&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">&quot;Digite aqui.&quot;</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">button_sent</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">st</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">button</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;Classificar&quot;</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">button_sent</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">session_state</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">button_sent</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">True</span>
    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">session_state</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">button_sent</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">get_tags</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">parse_ementa</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">input_ementa</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">get_tags</span><span class="p">:</span>
            <span class="n">st</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">multiselect</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;Tags&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">multi_tags</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">default</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">get_tags</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="k">else</span><span class="p">:</span>
            <span class="n">st</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">multiselect</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;Tags&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">multi_tags</span><span class="p">)</span>
            <span class="n">st</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">warning</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;N√£o h√° sugest√£o de classifica√ß√£o para a ementa consultada.&quot;</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">st</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">markdown</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;&lt;center&gt;&lt;blockquote cite=&#39;https://netoferraz.github.io/o-eu-analitico/&#39;&gt;&lt;p style=&#39;color: #bfc5d3;&#39;&gt;&lt;i&gt;py-classifica-legal √© uma prova de conceito desenvolvida por &lt;a href=&#39;https://netoferraz.github.io/o-eu-analitico/&#39; target=&#39;_blank&#39; style=&#39;color: #f97b6f;&#39;&gt; Jos√© Ferraz Neto&lt;/a&gt;.&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/blockquote&gt;&lt;/center&gt;&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">unsafe_allow_html</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">)</span>


<span class="k">if</span> <span class="vm">__name__</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s2">&quot;__main__&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span>
    <span class="n">main</span><span class="p">()</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
    {% endraw %}

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>Assim, podemos iniciar o servidor do streamlit e verificar a nossa aplica√ß√£o.</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p><img src="/o-eu-analitico/images/copied_from_nb/img/frontend-gov-data-product/streamlit-start-app.png" alt="streamlit-start-app"></p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>Com o servidor iniciado, podemos consultar a aplica√ß√£o rodando localmente em <code>http://localhost:8501</code>. E assim, o <code>py-classifica-legal</code> ganha vida com uma interface simples e direita ao que se prop√µe. Como estamos em um est√°gio de prova de conceito, a velocidade da entrega √© algo relevante, portanto, s√≥ queremos validar a ideia com os patrocionadores do projeto. Assim, qualquer melhoria deve ser realizada a posteriori.</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>Por fim, precisamos realizar o deploy da aplica√ß√£o. Para essa etapa, decidimos utilizar a plataform do <a href="https://www.heroku.com/">heroku</a>. Come√ßaremos definindo as depend√™ncias do projeto por meio do arquivo <code>requirements.txt</code></p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="requirements.txt">requirements.txt<a class="anchor-link" href="#requirements.txt"> </a></h3><p><code>streamlit==0.64.0</code></p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>Em seguida vamos construir um arquivo com algumas vari√°veis de configura√ß√£o do projeto <code>setup.sh</code>.</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="setup.sh">setup.sh<a class="anchor-link" href="#setup.sh"> </a></h3><div class="highlight"><pre><span></span>mkdir -p ~/.streamlit/

<span class="nb">echo</span> <span class="s2">&quot;\</span>
<span class="s2">[general]\n\</span>
<span class="s2">email = \&quot;seuemail@provedor\&quot;\n\</span>
<span class="s2">&quot;</span> &gt; ~/.streamlit/credentials.toml

<span class="nb">echo</span> <span class="s2">&quot;\</span>
<span class="s2">[server]\n\</span>
<span class="s2">headless = true\n\</span>
<span class="s2">enableCORS=false\n\</span>
<span class="s2">port = </span><span class="nv">$PORT</span><span class="s2">\n\</span>
<span class="s2">&quot;</span> &gt; ~/.streamlit/config.toml
</pre></div>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>Por fim, defineremos um arquivo <code>Procfile</code> que √© utilizado pela plataforma do <code>heroku</code>.</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="Procfile">Procfile<a class="anchor-link" href="#Procfile"> </a></h3><p><code>web: sh setup.sh &amp;&amp; streamlit run app.py</code></p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>Em termos de arquivos de configura√ß√£o, finalizamos. Agora temos que criar um app no <code>heroku</code> e realizar o deploy. O primeiro passo √©, √© fazer o login pelo <a href="https://devcenter.heroku.com/articles/heroku-cli">heroku-cli</a>, pelo comando a seguir:</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p><code>heroku login</code></p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>Realizado a devida autentica√ß√£o, iremos criar o app pelo comando:</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p><code>heroku create py-classifica-legal</code></p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>√â v√°lido ressaltar, que o diret√≥rio do projeto deve estar sob versionsamento, por exemplo, git. Uma vez criado o app pelo <code>heroku-cli</code> ele adicionar√° um remote ao seu reposit√≥rio local, como apresentado abaixo.</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p><img src="/o-eu-analitico/images/copied_from_nb/img/frontend-gov-data-product/heroku-remote.png" alt="git-remote"></p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>Estando todos os arquivos devidamente comitados, basta realizar o push para o <code>heroku</code> pelo comando:</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p><code>git push heroku master</code></p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>O processo de push iniciar√° automaticamente um build e havendo sucesso voc√™ receber√° uma confirma√ß√£o de deploy conclu√≠do e a url para acessar o app ü•≥ü•≥ü•≥.</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
